PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-10532017-08-10,  TC,  ,  , 
ActInternational Bridges and Tunnels Act
SubjectIssuance of the supplementary letters patent Amending the letters patent for the Windsor-Detroit Bridge Authority
PrecisOrder issuing for approval the supplementary letters patent Amending the letters patent of the WINDSOR-DETROIT BRIDGE AUTHORITY in order to (1) replace the Minister of Transport with the Minister of Infrastructure, Communities and Intergovernmental Affairs as the Minister responsible for the corporation; and (2) increase the size of the Board of Directors of the corporation from five to nine members.
AttachmentsAttachment
